title: Champion Select Chat Not Working
body: I know this has been a bug before and all the forums are closed now but this is real and happening to me now EVERY game I can't see my chat! I am afraid to play without a friend and a skype call so that my friend can tell me if I called the lane.... I have stopped playin league solo and I am really upset! in game chat works fine btw plz fix

replies.body: Have you tried using an alternative DNS? It may just be that you're on doesn't have the right addresses.
